ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: How are people getting the white scales
ygData.msgSnippet: I really hate Karnor s and have put this off too long. Join the club.  This is one Shxxty zone.  I really dont like it either. Some of the worst pathing and
ygData.messageBody:
"I really hate Karnor's and have put this off too long."

Join the club. This is one Shxxty zone. I really dont like it either. Some
of the worst pathing and agro problems here as in any zone I have been in,
currently. When the game first came out is a different story.(The warrens is
pretty bad too).

Mu

-----Original Message-----
From: Rebecca Small [mailto:rsmall@...]
Sent: Friday, May 25, 2001 9:02 AM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: [eqbards] Re: How are people getting the white scales


Tzeeth: I've never been on a Nag raid but I finally got Selo's drums a
couple months ago from the Skyfire Dragon. Gore dropped a set last time we
killed her also. I even saw someone auctioning a set in DL a couple days
ago. Wish I could recall the name for you. Sebasttian even offered me his
walrus drum when he got the Selos drums from Gore, not realizing I already
had Selo's drums and didn't lotto on purpose. You'll get drums, don't sweat
it!
As to keeping vox from Ch'ing, our theory is to have all the tanks on the
same side to cause her to move. The moving is supposed to interrupt her
spells. We've been susccessful with this the couple times I was along.
I have heard the spawned Trak is the same as the Real Trak in drops and
power, but I have not fought him personally.
AS for epic, I am more concerned now with the lycanthrope skull and phin's
backbone. Is the warlord in Karnor's the only mob that drops the skull? How
rare a drop is it? I really hate Karnor's and have put this off too long.

Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe
Venator Sapentia, Xegony
